definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: In chapter 2, Jesus attended a wedding.
sentences.chinese: 第二章记述耶稣应邀参加一个婚筵。

sentences.english: Dongshi Shu is a historical book that records how the Ming Dynasty managed Liaotung.
sentences.chinese: 《东事书》是一部记述明代经营辽东的史籍。

sentences.english: Flavour and fragrance biosynthesis via bioconversion of specific substrates are described.
sentences.chinese: 记述了由特定底物的生物转化合成香精香料。

sentences.english: At the end of Luke's gospel account is a different situation.
sentences.chinese: 可是，在路加福音尾段的记述，情况却不一样。

sentences.english: Here has also erected a Qing Dynasty inscriptions recording the matter.
sentences.chinese: 至今这里还竖有一清代碑刻记述此事。

sentences.english: The film mainly describes the Chihiro main three journey.
sentences.chinese: 影片中主要记述了千寻主要的三个旅程。

sentences.english: But the facts Thucydides reports are pregnant with judgments begging to be born.
sentences.chinese: 但修昔底德记述的事实孕育着产生判断的请求。

sentences.english: Biography, describes the history books all kinds of characters.
sentences.chinese: 传记，记述各类人物的史籍。

sentences.english: And, as a result, this book would have been mainly about Shanti Uncle.
sentences.chinese: 理所当然的，这本书本应主要记述山狄叔叔。

sentences.english: The rest of the book of Nehemiah is the story of how God answered that prayer.
sentences.chinese: 尼希米记馀下的部分，便是记述神怎样应允他的祷告。

sentences.english: This book explores the culture of ancient India through social structure.
sentences.chinese: 本书记述的是古印度的社会结构特色。

sentences.english: The books give several accounts of journeys made between the Burrow and London.
sentences.chinese: 书中给出了几次对陋居和伦敦之间旅程的记述。

sentences.english: The history book recorded the details of the vicissitude of times.
sentences.chinese: 这本史书详细地记述了时代的变迁。

sentences.english: But Plato has given us enough.
sentences.chinese: 但柏拉图的记述已足够。

sentences.english: In the ancient geography book Shanhai Jing (The Book of Mountains and Seas), there is an account of "Long-Leg Kingdom".
sentences.chinese: 古文献《山海经》中有关于“长股国”的记述。

sentences.english: In this paper, 23 genus 37 species of syrphids are recorded.
sentences.chinese: 本文共记述了云南西双版纳地区23属37种食蚜蝇。

definition: to recount what happened prior to events already known
to compose (a piece of writing)/to write/(written) work/writer
